planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
b. Move toward a bounty target (character, crew, faceup/facedown contact)
action: Buy a ship card. If unable and on a planet, discard the top card of the cargo market deck and gain 4 000 credits
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. Encounter a patrol in this space that has ship attack less or equal to this player's ship attack.
c. Encounter a bounty target in this space (character, crew, faceup contact)
d. Gain 4 000 credits. Then, lose 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).
